_comment: Azure Function Local Settings Template - Copy this to local.settings.json and configure for your environment

Values._sqlserver_comment: For SQL Server: Set DB_TYPE to 'sqlserver' and provide DB_CONNECTION_STRING
Values._postgresql_comment: For PostgreSQL: Set DB_TYPE to 'postgresql' and provide DB_CONNECTION_STRING
Values._cosmosdb_comment: For Azure Cosmos DB: Set DB_TYPE to 'cosmosdb' and provide connection details
Values._azurestorage_comment: For Azure Storage Tables: Set DB_TYPE to 'azurestorage' and provide storage account details
